This place has excellent tapas, great cocktails and reasonably priced (and DELICIOUS) entrees! The patates braves was excellent, as was the Eco chicken breast.  They also have gluten-free options for those with Celiacs.  Service was great (and they spoke English which is a plus for me given my limited Spanish/Catalon) and they also offer free wifi.  If you are like me and prefer more mainstream cuisine, I would highly recommend this bar!
